public java.lang.String login​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      • login

        @ResponseBody
@PostMapping("/login")
public java.lang.String login​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                              @RequestBody
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> loginParam)
                       throws org.json.JSONException
        Login Function by POST request
        Parameters:
        model - the result of 10 users in GitHub with the high count in history and for bad input
        loginParam - the username and password the stored iin Map
        Returns:
        if the username and password is true return json of OK else return NOT
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - exception for json that we send back to the client

        Parameters:
